name: The Renovator: Origins
description:
The Renovator: Origins is a first-person psychological horror game.
Explore the mysterious world of art, where each exhibit contains the mysteries and secrets of its era and its creator. The game will immerse you in the past and another world that is behind the paintings.



Plot: We play as the son of a restorer, a museum worker who died tragically. While searching for the memorabilia, the door suddenly closes and strange things begin to happen. The hero is waiting for immersion in the world of art and the paranormal.

Gameplay: Hidden Objects, Solving Puzzles and Investigating the Mystery of Father's Death


Setting: Present time and the USSR of the 60s


Features:
  • Close attention to detail, both the setting and the plot.
  • An art world that we can enter
  • Interactivity
  • Random events
  • Good graphics
